hero.intro1: Codepackers is a software design and development company.
hero.intro2: Our team combines years of expertise with modern AI-driven practices to deliver scalable, future-ready solutions.

alaap.title: Alaap Framework
alaap.subtitle: Enterprise AI Agents
alaap.description: Empower your organization with personified AI agents that understand your business, speak your language, and protect your data.
alaap.platformDesc: The Alaap platform can create AI agents for:

pustak.title: Pustak Framework
pustak.subtitle: Streamlined ERP & Workflows
pustak.description: A powerful, modular framework built for enterprise operations like CRM, HRMS, Projects, SCM & more. Includes user control, dashboards, audit logs, notifications & role-based access.
pustak.platformDesc: The Pustak platform caters to the requirements of data management systems for:

messages: Show me the Q3 sales report for the Delhi region
I've found the Q3 sales report for Delhi. The region showed 23% growth with ₹2.4 crores in revenue.
Please, provide me a breakdown of top three product categories

capabilities.title: Platform
capabilities.subtitle: Purpose-built features for conversational AI and enterprise systems
capabilities.clickPrompt: Click on any card to know more

communication.title: Multi-Channel Communication
communication.short: Chat, voice messages, internet calls, and telephone integration
communication.description: Chat, voice messages, internet calls, and telephone integration

voice.title: Voice Intelligence
voice.short: Real-time speech recognition and customizable voices
voice.description: Real-time speech recognition and synthesis with customizable voices

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Private knowledge repositories with enterprise-grade security

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.short: Break barriers with smart translation & localization
multilingual.description: Break language barriers with intelligent translation and localization

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Deep insights into conversations, sentiment, and user behavior

management.title: User Management
management.short: Group & role management for user access
management.description: Comprehensive user and group management with role-based access

agents.title: AI Conversational Agents
agents.short: Human-like AI chatbots and voice assistants for enterprises
agents.description: These are advanced AI agents, like chatbots and voice assistants, designed to mimic human conversation. They enable seamless, intuitive interactions for users within enterprise environments, automating support, sales, and information retrieval to enhance customer and employee experiences.

erp.title: ERP Solutions / Data Management
erp.short: CRM, HR, Inventory, Tasks, Visitors data entry and analytics
erp.description: Comprehensive systems for managing crucial business data across departments. This includes CRM for customer interactions, HR for personnel, inventory tracking, project management, and scheduling for meetings and visitors. It centralizes data entry, ensures efficient management, and provides insightful analytics.

apps.title: Web and Mobile Applications
apps.short: Data entry, storage & workflow apps for all devices
apps.description: Tailored software designed for diverse platforms, offering customized solutions for data entry, secure storage, and streamlined workflow management. These applications ensure accessibility and functionality across all types of devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones, enhancing operational efficiency.

communication.title: Communication Systems
communication.short: Multilingual Chat, Voice/Video Calls with Translation
communication.description: Sophisticated platforms facilitating real-time communication across various mediums. Features include multilingual chat, voice messaging, and high-quality voice and video calls, often with integrated online translation for global interactions, fostering seamless and effective collaboration.

integration.title: Software Systems Integration
integration.short: Connecting tools, platforms & databases into smart ecosystem
integration.description: The process of connecting disparate software applications, tools, platforms, and databases. This creates a unified and intelligent ecosystem, enabling seamless data flow, improved operational efficiency, and enhanced decision-making by eliminating silos and automating workflows.

analytics.title: Data Analytics
analytics.short: Visualizing insights using dashboards and AI-driven tools
analytics.description: The process of examining raw data to extract meaningful insights. This involves visualizing data through interactive dashboards and employing AI-driven analysis, and prediction algorithms to identify trends, patterns, and valuable information, supporting informed decision-making and strategic planning.

solutions.title: Specialized
solutions.subtitle: Digital Solutions
solutions.description: We have also designed and developed intelligent systems for healthcare, disaster management, education, automation, and communication—leveraging AI, IoT, and modern web technologies.

team.title: Our
team.subtitle: Team
team.description: The team is led by experienced professionals and powered by a diverse team of specialists. We deliver excellence across all aspects of software development and operations.

leadership.description: Overall technology vision, driving innovation in AI and enterprise solutions

teamComposition.title: Expert
teamComposition.subtitle: Team Composition
teamComposition.description: Meet the minds behind our innovation—specialists across domains collaborating to deliver impactful solutions.

technicalSkills.title: Our
technicalSkills.subtitle: Technical Skills
technicalSkills.description: We build secure, scalable, and modern solutions using cutting-edge tools and frameworks.

contact.title: Get
contact.subtitle: Started
contact.description: Ready to transform your enterprise communication with AI? Let's discuss how our platform can meet your specific needs.

rightCard.title: Drop us a line!
rightCard.description: Want to explore our AI solutions or schedule a live demo? Send us a WhatsApp or fill the form below. We're eager to assist!
